product.title: Comaie Pro Curling Iron Brush 1 Inch Hair Curler Brush Ceramic Hot Brush Styling Dryer Comb Curl Tool Voltage for Long Hair
product.title_excluding_brand: Pro Curling Iron Brush 1 Inch Hair Curler Brush Ceramic Hot Brush Styling Dryer Comb Curl Tool Voltage for Long Hair
product.description:
Features: You can use it to curl, straighten your hair, or as a normal comb for long hair. [NOTE: NO WORKING FOR HOT AIR.]

The red indicateor light blinks until set temperature is reached. start using once the indicator light stays on.

Turn the on and select the temperature setting for your preference Simply brush entire hairstyle underneath and on top,to achieve a smoother,shinier and softer styler,or,section and roll each area as you would with a round brush and blow dryer to create maximum fullness,body and bounce Use on dry hair only, 2 setting Temperature 160C And 200C, Non-slip rubber grip

Specification:

Material: +metal

Cable length：2.6M

Heat conductor diameter:28/50mm

The best modelling time: 1-2 minutes

Voltage: 100-240V/50Hz-60Hz

Power: 34W

Application：For Hairdressing(dry)

ItemSize:28.5cmx 5cm

Package Included :

-1x Rolling Straightener

-1 x Manual

product.description_full_html:
Features: You can use it to curl, straighten your hair, or as a normal comb for long hair. [NOTE: NO WORKING FOR HOT AIR.] 

The red indicateor light blinks until set temperature is reached. start using once the indicator light stays on. 

Turn the on and select the temperature setting for your preference Simply brush entire hairstyle underneath and on top,to achieve a smoother,shinier and softer styler,or,section and roll each area as you would with a round brush and blow dryer to create maximum fullness,body and bounce Use on dry hair only, 2 setting Temperature 160C And 200C, Non-slip rubber grip

The best modelling time: 1-2 minutes

  • You can use it to curl, straighten your hair, or as a normal comb for long hair. [NOTE: NO WORKING FOR HOT AIR.]
  • Use on dry hair only, 2 setting Temperature 160C And 200C, Non-slip rubber grip
  • Turn the on and select the temperature setting for your preference
  • The red indicateor light blinks until set temperature is reached.start using once the indicator light stays on.
  • Unique Shape for smoothing the hair, while round edges create volume

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
